alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 02 at 7:13AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, EAST CENTRAL ASCENSION, NORTHEASTERN ST. JAMES, SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON AND SOUTHEASTERN TANGIPAHOA PARISHES THROUGH 745 AM CST... At 712 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 11 miles northwest of Reserve, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lutcher, Garyville, Killian, and W Lk Pontchartrain Buoy. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 190 and 198. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 6 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. James; St. John The Baptist
